mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_ID ,ORG_CD ,APPROVED_DTIME ,APPROVED_NUM ,STATUS ,PAY_TYPE ,TRANS_DTIME ,MERCHANT_NAME ,MERCHANT_REGNO ,APPROVED_AMT ,MODIFIED_AMT ,TOTAL_INSTALL_CNT ,API_TRAN_DAY ,API_TRAN_ID ,REG_USER_ID ,REG_DT ,CHG_USER_ID ,CHG_DT FROM CARD_APR_DM_HIST WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND ORG_CD = #{orgCd} AND APPROVED_DTIME = #{approvedDtime} AND APPROVED_NUM = #{approvedNum}
